name: Boys Craft: Winter King
description:
Plunge into the world of the Middle Ages, and bring back power to your Kingdom.

The game offers a variety of biomes and maps, explore caves and mines.
Unique choice of characters (for boys and girls), a variety of maps, search for resources and craft items to create different buildings, survival, and more will not let you get bored!

Three game modes: classic, creative mode, and "Kingdom", where you can continue the development and construction of your Castle, which is inhabited by different characters, communicate with citizens, build your houses, castles, farms, taverns, or other creative constructions!

- Completely free game for kids and adults.
- A large set of interior and furniture selection.
- Two texture packs and new blocks.
- Explore the mine, mining treasures and make new friends.
- Mobile edition includes new maps and characters inhabiting this world!
